label: 桜人
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A saibara centering on dialogue between a husband and his wife. The husband asks a man of [a place called] Sakura" to take him somewhere in his boat; the wife suspects him of philandering. [催馬楽]"
